text: @reidepstein @GlennF Yes. Math is a difficult thing for the stupid...but if the mortality rate is 2%...that means 98% of the people who get #COVID19 recover. But if enough people are infected, 2% becomes a very large amount of dead Americans. Cc: @SenRonJohnson
